item.title: Linux 6.18-rc6 Released With Fix For ARM64 "Catastrophic Performance Issue"
item.description: Linus Torvalds is out today with the eighth weekly test release of the Linux 6.18 kernel in working toward the stable release at the end of the month...

item.title: Kernel prepatch 6.18-rc6
item.description: Linus has released 6.18-rc6 for testing. "So we have a slightly larger rc6 than usual, but I think it's just the random noise and a result of pull request timings rather than due to any issues with the release. But I guess we have a couple of weeks remaining to find out."

item.title: Rust Adoption Drives Android Memory Safety Bugs Below 20% for First Time
item.description:
Google has disclosed that the company's continued adoption of the Rust programming language in Android has resulted in the number of memory safety vulnerabilities falling below 20% of total vulnerabilities for the first time.
